Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Full-featured invoice and receipt generator

Complete implementation with all Week 1-4 features:

## Core Features
- AI-powered receipt/invoice generation using Google Gemini
- Professional PDF export with custom branding
- Document type toggle (receipts vs invoices)
- Invoice status tracking (Draft/Sent/Paid/Overdue)
- Tax calculation and payment terms
- Client management and document history

## Pro Features
- Custom logo upload and brand colors
- Business information on all documents
- Onboarding wizard for new Pro users
- Unlimited AI generations

## Technical Stack
- React 19.2.0 + TypeScript 5.8.2
- Vite for blazing fast development
- Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- Google Gemini AI integration
- Local-first data storage (localStorage)

## Mobile & Polish
- Fully responsive across all device sizes
- Mobile-optimized button layouts and navigation
- Cross-browser compatible (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- Updated FAQ and pricing pages
